title: Logitech M510 Wireless Mouse
description: EnlargeLogitech Wireless Mouse M510A full-size laser mouse that does more.Do more, more easily with your mouse. With soft rubber grips and a contoured shape, this full size mouse provides all-day comfort, while Back/Forward buttons, side-to-side scrolling plus zoom and programmable buttons empower you to click, scroll and zoom with the flick of a finger. Enjoy laser tracking for smooth cursor control and two years of battery life. Comes with a tiny Logitech Unifying receiver that stays put in your computer, so you can plug it in, forget it, and add up to six Unifying compatible devices without additional USB receivers.Learn more about the Unifying receiver >Download a spec sheetFeaturesEnlargeNice gripGive your hand a rest. Its contoured shape will support your hand comfortably all day long.EnlargeTake a short-cutDo the things you do most, more quickly—like fly through documents or Web pages—with three programmable buttons, Back/Forward buttons and side-to-side scrolling plus zoom*.*Requires Logitech SetPoint software (Windows) or Logitech Control Center software (Mac OS X), available for download at www.logitech.com/downloads.EnlargeIt's got juiceDon't worry about swapping batteries—get up to 2 years of battery life*. An On/Off switch and smart sleep mode help conserve power, while its battery indicator light eliminates surprises.*Battery life may vary based on user and computing conditionsEnlargeStay on trackEnjoy precise laser tracking for smooth, responsive cursor control on almost any surface*.*The laser sensor does not work on glass or mirrors. CompatibilityWorks withWindows XP, Windows Vista or Windows 7Mac OS X 10.4 or laterUSB portPackage ContentsLogitech Wireless Mouse M510Logitech Unifying receiver2 AA batteries (pre-installed)User documentation3-year limited hardware warranty
